headline: Should Investors Rethink MarketAxess After Recent Double-Digit Price Drop in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with your MarketAxess Holdings shares? You’re not alone. Whether you’re sizing up a new position or wondering if it’s time to hold tight, the stock’s recent performance has a lot of investors double-checking their strategy. Over the past year, MarketAxess has seen its price slide by a hefty 39.9%, with even bigger losses over a longer stretch: down 67.7% in the last five years. This isn’t just short-term noise, either. Year to date, the stock has dropped 24.0%, and...
